channel.title: People can't connect to my server! Please help asap
channel.description:
Alright well I downloaded a server and a client. Changed the clients ip to my hamachi ip. I run the server and the client and I can connect fine to it. My friend downloaded the same client but he can't connect? Please help! Will give $1 to the person who helps me through paypal!
aim - iReflexFTW

item.title: People can't connect to my server! Please help asap
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

1 He needs the same IP
2 He needs to be in your Hamachi network

Read full topic
item.source: People can't connect to my server! Please help asap
